titleStmt.title: The generous enemies, or, The ridiculous lovers a comedy : as it is acted at the Theatre Royal by His Maiesties servants / by John Corye, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Corye, John.
Quinault, Philippe, 1635-1688. Généreuse ingratitude.
Corneille, Thomas, 1625-1709. D. Bertran de Cigarral.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Lloyd for James Magnus ...,

notesStmt.note: Borrows chiefly from Quinault's La généreuse ingratitude, and Corneille's D. Bertran de Cigarral.
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
